thread.title: CustomADB offers Shortcuts, Integrated Tools, and an Enhanced UI for Windows
thread.title_full: CustomADB offers Shortcuts, Integrated Tools, and an Enhanced UI for Windows

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: CustomADB offers Shortcuts, Integrated Tools, and an Enhanced UI for Windows
text: If you find yourself spending a lot of time interacting with your device via the Android Debug Bridge (ADB), then check out CustomADB by XDA Junior Member TheBone_ . This is an extended ADB command prompt that offers several shortcuts to useful commands, integrated tools, online help/documentation, and an enhanced UI. It is available for any Windows user with ADB installed system-wide (meaning the binary has been added to the PATH system variable).
